parameter.name: CRUDDBEntities-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: CRUDDBEntities Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: metadata=res://*/crudModel.csdl|res://*/crudModel.ssdl|res://*/crudModel.msl;provider=System.Data.SqlClient;provider connection string=" data source=tcp:crudserver.database.windows.net,1433;Initial Catalog=CRUDDB;Persist Security Info=False;User ID=go2mahesh;Password=Purple1!;MultipleActiveResultSets=False;Encrypt=True;TrustServerCertificate=False;Connection Timeout=30;App=EntityFramework"
